overview: James Toga brings over 20 years’ technical and management experience in development and operations to Vivox. Before joining Vivox, Toga was COO at Free World Dialup, where he drove the direction of the company’s leading standards-based Internet Telephony Services community. Prior to Free World Dialup, Toga co-founded mobile and premise-based wireless Internet access provider, MobWifi, Inc. Prior to that, Toga was director of engineering and VP of operations at eDial, Inc. Toga also held management positions at Intel Corp., Banyan Systems, Inc. and Xylogics, Inc. He is the owner of five patents in the Internet and IP Telephony spaces. Toga earned an MS in Computer Science from Northeastern University and a BS in Chemistry from Tufts University.

relationships.title: Founder and Vice President of Engineering
